content: these small drawstring bags are about 5 tall and 4 across when laid flat they are the perfect size to use as a dice bag or to hold any trinkets or small items the pattern includes 3 different styles each following the same pattern but using a different stitch in alternating row one uses row of double_crochet another uses crossed double_crochet and the last uses the bead stitch the top has a row of chain spaces to create eyelets to thread the drawstring through
